title: Cost-Benefit Analysis
description: An agent must perform a cost-benefit analysis for a proposed IT project.

tasks.description: List all the one-time costs associated with the project (e.g., 'software licenses', 'implementation services').
List all the expected annual benefits (e.g., 'reduced manual effort in hours', 'lower maintenance fees').
Convert all benefits to a monetary value and calculate the payback period for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the payback period in years.
